channel.title: Last.fm Music Downloader
channel.description:
Last.fm stores its music such as:
http://s7.last.fm/user/10834319/9569e1a02f1260080711816e7031b920/71/0007174062/d4aa391fe21c6dbf555c8b1a989d79c9/1225481618/25/6967266/reg/1/0.mp3
and
http://s17.last.fm/user/10834319/7cb5fd6a96c55526be5a5bd97bdd6934/311/0018158411/a4f80e418c858bf810d39fa511d20070/1225481230/44/6798392/reg/1/0.mp3
[img]http://img389.imageshack.us/img389/5882/lastfmuh2.png[/img]
s17 is the server the music file is stored on, from s0 - s20 something
10834319 is my username id
7cb5fd6a96c55526be5a5bd97bdd6934 is my session for my username
311/0018158411 is the artist folder and genre
a4f80e418c858bf810d39fa511d20070/1225481230 is the artist playing session
44/6798392 - i dont know what this is, maybe song info?
however, unlike myspace "Sessions" must be created with the user, i was thinking of creating a program which ran real-time along side last.fm, either a) a firefox plugin or b) an external java application.
when the songs are stored a description is saved of the song, so it can be named and ID3 tags can be given.
and i was hoping for some peoples input on this, would it be used? would anyone be interested? would you like to help?
let me know, Ollie[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 01:48:45 pm[/size][hr]watch this
http://www.metacafe.com/watch/803569/how_to_download_last_fm_music_by_orbit_downloader_incoming_soon/

item.title: Last.fm Music Downloader

item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Have one hook last.fm(I forget if it’s an external application or just a plugin) and have it ‘record’ as it plays?

I forget how last.fm worked.
